document_title: Arthritis: Causes, symptoms, treatment and prevention
subsection_content:
The following signs and symptoms indicate that your joints are likely inflamed:
Athritis; Stiff and swollen joints; Limited range of motion in affected joints; Redness and warmth of the area around the affected joint; Fever; Tired; Uncomfortable; Tumors and tumors appear
subsection_data:
viem khop.json. Symptoms of arthritis
The following signs and symptoms indicate that your joints are likely inflamed:
